title: Bridging the Language Gap: Knowledge Injected Multilingual Question Answering. (arXiv:2304.03159v1 [cs.CL])
abstract: Question Answering (QA) is the task of automatically answering questions posed by humans in natural languages. There are different settings to answer a question, such as abstractive, extractive, boolean, and multiple-choice QA. As a popular topic in natural language processing tasks, extractive question answering task (extractive QA) has gained extensive attention in the past few years. translated_title: 跨越语言鸿沟：注入知识的多语言问答
translated_abstract: 问答（QA）是一种自动回答人类自然语言问题的任务。提取式问答任务（Extractive QA）已经成为自然语言处理任务中备受关注的一个重要方向。与此同时，随着世界的不断发展，不同语言间的通用跨语言转移（G-XLT）带来了跨语言转移（XLT）无法解决的一些独特挑战。本文提出了一个通用的G-XLT框架，通过知识注入的方式，丰富模型对不同语言问答中的知识迁移的理解，从而为实现跨语言的QA任务提供了一些新思路。
tldr: 本文提出了一个跨越语言鸿沟的通用问答框架，通过知识注入帮助模型更好地理解不同语言问答之间的知识迁移。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a generalized question answering framework that spans the language gap and enhances cross-lingual transfer through knowledge injection, providing new insights for achieving cross-lingual QA tasks.
